The Cybermen have been a persistent enemy of the Doctor throughout the series.

The concept of the Cybermen breaking through plastic sheets is a recurring theme in their appearances, including in "The Tomb of the Cybermen" (1967), "The Invasion" (1968), and "Earthshock" (1982). The Cybermen were also featured in the novel "Iceberg" by actor David Banks, who played the Cyber Leader in the television series.

In addition, the Cybermen have been featured in various media, including novels such as "Killing Ground" and "Cybermen", as well as in the Titan Comics 2016 multi-Doctor event story "Supremacy of the Cybermen". This story depicts the last Cybermen forming an alliance with Rassilon with the goal of conquering Gallifrey and using Time Lord energy to regenerate the universe under Cyber-control.
